*R/ml_pipeline_utils.R*

## ml_add_stage

## Description
Adds a stage to a pipeline. 


## Usage
```r
ml_add_stage(x, stage) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| x | A pipeline or a pipeline stage. |
| stage | A pipeline stage. |
